data.message: [telegram] Add client to fetch messages sent to a Telegram bot

data.message: [telegram] Support filtering of messages by chat

data.message: [tests] Add unit tests for Jira backend

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message: [confluence] Add client to use Conluence REST API

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message:
[confluence] Skip removed or private contents

In Confluence, some removed or private contents might be listed
when a search query is run. Those contents are not available and
any access to them returns either a 404 or 500 error.

This patch handles those response errors, skipping the access
to the contents.

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message:
[tests] Fix cache tests for Telegram backend

The test did not use the list of cached items when it checked
if they were successfully retrieved from the cache. Instead,
it used the items fetched from the server.

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message:
[telegram] Include 'offset' metadata on each item

Due to Telegram backend only allows to fetch items passing an
'offset' value and not the typical 'from_date' parameter,
that it is used in most of the backends, it is usefull to include
the offset of each item as metadata.

This commit adds the decorator 'telegram_metadata()' to include
this keyword in metadata section.

This commit updates Telegram backend to 0.2.0 version.

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message:
[supybot] Fix crash while parsing action messages

Fixes #48.

The messages that start with a single '*' are considered as
action messages sent by a poster or user. The current version
of the Supybot parser raised an error when these messages were
found. This patch fix that problem. Unit tests were also added.

Backend version increased to 0.1.1 .

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message:
[stackexchange] Sleep the client when 'backoff' field is received

According to StackExchange documentation, "a dynamic throttle
is also in place on a per-method level. If an application
receives a response with the backoff field set, it must wait
that many seconds before hitting the same method again."

This patch makes the client to wait the seconds set on 'backoff'
field before sending a new requests.

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message:
[tests] Fix invalid mock server config in stackexchange test

On 'test_get_questions_more()' test, the httpretty configuration
for the mock HTTP server was wrong. It worked because httpretty
push the bodies that will be returned to a queue, but the coded
behaviour was wrong. This patch fixes that problem.

The test has been renamed to 'test_get_questions_pagination'.

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message: [tests] Remove unused imports on StackExchange backend tests

data.Author: Alvaro del Castillo <acs@bitergia.com>
data.message:
[gerrit] Fix query format when filtering several blacklisted reviews

The query to fetch the reviews was badly formed when serveral
blacklisted reviews were set to be filtered.

Fixes #50

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message:
[supybot] Ignore empty comment lines

Some log files can contain empty comment lines. These lines
have the pattern "2016-07-19T01:02:03  <nick>". This commit
makes the parser to ignore these lines without raising any
parsing exception.

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message: [tests] Improve 'fetch' tests on StackExchange and GitHub backends
